author: parithosh
content:
okay i traced down the weirdest bug ever...
when i set  `export DEPOSIT_CONTRACT_ADDRESS="0x6f22fFbC56eFF051aECF839396DD1eD9aD6BBA9D"` on the genesis tool, all the blocks built are missing (even for deneb, let alone peerdas). But when i remove it, it defaults to `DEPOSIT_CONTRACT_ADDRESS="0x424242..."` and then it works and produces blocks! is there some specific reason why one deposit contract works and the other fails? ðŸ˜…  As far as i can tell, the genesis tool doesn't have any specific logic so any address should work, but it could ofc be our tool as well...

author: skylenet
content: The dora view is wrong. It's still using `csc` field from the ENR instead of `cgc`. But if you check the peer details, all peers report a `cgc=0x80 (128)`, which means that they should be supernodes.
